data.text: 27 Use this feature if you prefer your coffee a bit stronger. It slows the brewing process, lengthening the time the water is in contact with the coffee. 28 Use the Z button to choose the setting you want � the setting shows in the bottom right corner of the display: blank = normal strength (the default setting) b = stronger a = even stronger , If you want to change these settings, you should do so before making coffee.
data.question: My coffee is too light
